function.name: get_relevant_data
function.description: Extracts structured data from an HTML webpage file in the /tmp/outputs directory using a CSS selector. Optionally limits DOM structure depth.

file_name.description: Name of the file containing the HTML content.

js_selector.description: CSS selector to identify the target data.

max_depth.description: Optional maximum depth for DOM structure extraction (capped at 15). Defaults to 10.
